channel.title: Galaxy of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the galaxy of the day.

item.title: Galaxy Minstrels
item.description: Galaxy Minstrels are milk chocolate buttons with a hard glazed shell sold in several countries including the United Kingdom, Republic of Ireland, South Africa, Kenya, Cyprus, Malta, Canada and Spain. In line with Mars' re-branding, Minstrels were brought under the Galaxy brand and are now sold as "Galaxy Minstrels", referring to the use of Galaxy chocolate in them.
